class.name: PLATEAUCityObjectTypeNode
class.brief_description: Node in the city object type hierarchy tree.
class.description: PLATEAUCityObjectTypeNode represents a category or specific type in the CityGML type hierarchy. For example, the Building category contains RoofSurface, WallSurface, GroundSurface, etc.

method.name: add_child
method.description: Add a child node to this node.

method.name: get_child_count
method.description: Get the number of child nodes.

method.name: is_leaf
method.description: Check if this is a leaf node (actual type, not a category).

method.name: contains_type
method.description: Check if this node or any descendant matches the given type.

method.name: get_all_types
method.description: Get all types in this subtree (including this node if it's a type).

members.member: City object type (0 for category nodes, actual PLATEAUCityObjectType value for leaf nodes).
Package type this node belongs to (PLATEAUCityModelPackage value).
